item.description:
Ok a great day is planned- meet at the Met- then eat at the Turks walk around and back to the country. It will be great to get out of Ct make new friends and explore. The museum is big so plan what you will see so we can have lunch by 2ish- we might have to take cabs or sub to get there.

http://www.metmuseum.org/visit/hours-and-admission

info above for admission-

who ever wants to meet up for train- in Stamford station- We will take train from around 930am to meet at metropolitan museum by 11am- then figure late lunch around 2:30pm at 

http://www.seventurkishgrill.com

 

i am going to reserve under my name- so if you are not sure about eating with us or doing the whole plan- let me know or Denise- the place will give us a 10%discount for our group. Go check out the menu ahead- its great..

I have to give final count by Friday before

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: nyc museum day and lunch Holiday time
